title: Jason La Canfora on Aaron Rodgers possible deal, future of Earl Thomas, Le'Veon Bell (Football 07/18)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports NFL Insider Jason La Canfora to break down the ramifications of the Steelers not giving Le'Veon Bell a contract, what Earl Thomas' future will be with the Seahawks, whether guys like DeMarcus Lawrence and Ezekiel Ansah should just play out the franchise tag, if the Ravens are capable of winning the AFC North and if the Mitchell Trubisky/Bears hype train is out of control.
